solution_line_template: She made ${money_made_from_drums} from hitting drums because {entry_cost} - {money_lost} = <<{entry_cost}-{money_lost}={money_made_from_drums}>>{money_made_from_drums}
She hit {drums_for_money_made} drums in order to make the ${money_made_from_drums} because {money_made_from_drums}/{value_per_drum_dollar} = {drums_for_money_made}
She hit {total_drums_hit} drums in total because {drums_for_money_made} + {threshold_drums} = <<{drums_for_money_made}+{threshold_drums}={total_drums_hit}>>{total_drums_hit}
